channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect Client

item.title: CVE-2022-22474|2024-09-16T17:07:59.406Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20client
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.14.0 dsmcad, dsmc, and dsmcsvc processes incorrectly handle certain read operations on TCP/IP sockets. This can result in a denial of service for IBM Spectrum Protect client operations. IBM X-Force ID: 225348.
